title: Simulation-Based Online Science Education Design: Focusing on Asynchronous Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science fundamentals and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A program for in-service elementary educators to systematically acquire scientific inquiry methods in VR/simulation environments and develop competencies applicable to educational settings through asynchronous collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design elementary science experiment environments at least three times using VR simulation tools.
Learners can improve educational scenarios at least twice based on peer-reviewed feedback from asynchronous discussion platforms.
Learners can present at least one case of developing and applying simulation-based assessment rubrics in educational settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
